Obtain Signature Index for Cancer Types

Source: R/get_sig_cancer_type_index.R
get_sig_cancer_type_index.Rd

Obtain Signature Index for Cancer Types

get_sig_cancer_type_index(
  sig_type = c("legacy", "SBS", "DBS", "ID"),
  seq_type = c("WGS", "WES"),
  source = c("PCAWG", "TCGA", "nonPCAWG"),
  keyword = NULL
)

Arguments

sig_type

signature type.

seq_type

sequencing type.

source

data source.

keyword

keyword to search in the signature index database.

Value

a list.

Examples

l1 <- get_sig_cancer_type_index()
#> 
#> 
#> |full name                           |signature type                   |
#> |:-----------------------------------|:--------------------------------|
#> |Adrenocortical carcinoma            |1,2,4,5,6,13,18                  |
#> |Acute lymphoblastic leukemia        |1,2,5,13                         |
#> |Acute myelogenous leukemia          |1,5                              |
#> |Bladder                             |1,2,5,10,13                      |
#> |Breast                              |1,2,3,5,6,8,10,13,17,18,20,26,30 |
#> |Cervix                              |1,2,5,6,10,13,26                 |
#> |Chondrosarcoma                      |1,5                              |
#> |B-cell chronic lymphocytic leukemia |1,2,5,9,13                       |
#> |Colorectum                          |1,5,6,10                         |
#> |Glioblastoma                        |1,5,11                           |
#> |Glioma Low grade                    |1,5,6,14                         |
#> |Head and neck                       |1,2,4,5,7,13                     |
#> |Kidney Chromophobe                  |1,5,6                            |
#> |Kidney Clear Cell                   |1,5,6,27                         |
#> |Kidney Papillary                    |1,2,5,13                         |
#> |Liver                               |1,4,5,6,12,16,17,22,23,24        |
#> |Lung Adeno                          |1,2,4,5,6,13,17                  |
#> |Lung Small Cell                     |1,4,5,15                         |
#> |Lung Squamous                       |1,2,4,5,13                       |
#> |Lymphoma B-cell                     |1,2,5,9,13,17                    |
#> |Lymphoma Hodgkin                    |1,5,25                           |
#> |Medulloblastoma                     |1,5,8                            |
#> |Melanoma                            |1,5,7,11,17                      |
#> |Masopharyngeal Carcinoma            |1,2,5,13                         |
#> |Masopharyngeal Carcinoma            |1,2,5,6,13                       |
#> |Neuroblastoma                       |1,5,18                           |
#> |Oesophagus                          |1,2,4,5,6,13,17                  |
#> |Oral gingivo-buccal squamous        |1,2,5,7,13,29                    |
#> |Osteosarcoma                        |1,2,5,6,13,30                    |
#> |Ovary                               |1,3,5                            |
#> |Pancreas                            |1,2,3,5,6,13                     |
#> |Paraganglioma                       |1,5                              |
#> |Pilocytic Astrocytoma               |1,5,19                           |
#> |Prostate                            |1,5,6                            |
#> |Stomach                             |1,2,5,13,15,17,18,20,21,26,28    |
#> |Thyroid                             |1,2,5,13                         |
#> |Urothelial Carcinoma                |1,2,5,13,22                      |
#> |Uterine Carcinoma                   |1,2,5,6,10,13,14,26              |
#> |Uterine Carcinosarcoma              |1,2,5,6,10,13                    |
#> |Uveal Melanoma                      |1,5,6                            |
l2 <- get_sig_cancer_type_index(sig_type = "SBS")
#> 
#> 
#> |cancer type         |SBS list                                                             |

l3 <- get_sig_cancer_type_index(sig_type = "DBS", source = "PCAWG", seq_type = "WGS")

l5 <- get_sig_cancer_type_index(keyword = "breast")
